name: CPU Sat
Description: CPU is overloaded, leading to degraded performance.

name: Mem Sat
Description: System memory is fully utilized, causing slowdowns.

name: Net Sat
Description: Network bandwidth is fully consumed, affecting communication.

name: Svc Cont
Description: Multiple services competing for limited resources.

name: HW Cont
Description: Multiple workloads competing for CPU, disk, or memory.

name: Comm Lat
Description: Delay in network communication affecting performance.
